title: ct_policy_eval_ctx_set_time error
body: ct_policy_eval_ctx_set_time error at the procces wasnt found in your library of dynamic connection libcrypto-1_1.dll .... HELP ME FAST

replies.body: i also got the same problem : (
This is an unusual error, and while I have some ideas I need some more info.  Could you grab me a screenshot of this error, and specifics on where it's happening exactly?  Let me know!
Here's a screenshot of the error. http://sv.tinypic.com/r/2cyh27b/9

I have the same problem, it began when I was installing the new patch. During the installment the patcher froze and shut down. Later when I tried to start it again it went through smoothly but when i pressed play the client crashed. 

I have tried to reinstall the game but it hasn't worked out.
